pageContext.claim: “In fact, we're looking at projections with all of the money coming in for the new auto plants and other things. That number will be doubled in a very short period of time.”
pageContext.analysis: The Bureau of Economic Analysis found that Japanese firms funded {over 860,000} jobs through direct investment in 2016. While the amount of investment has substantially increased, it hasn't doubled and so, there’s no indication that the number of jobs funded would double.
